Enclosing class:
MEM
public static class MEM.Frame extends Object
A stack frame.

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final long
    argsSize
    The size of the block of (call, i.e., outgoing) arguments within a frame.
    final long
    depth
    The function's static depth (global functions are at depth 0).
    final MEM.Temp
    FP
    The register to hold the frame pointer.
    final MEM.Label
    label
    The function's entry label.
    final long
    locsSize
    The size of the block of local variables within a frame.
    final MEM.Temp
    RV
    The register to hold the return value.
    final long
    size
    The size of the frame.

    Frame(MEM.Label label, long depth, long locsSize, long argsSize, long size)

  • Constructor Details

    • Frame

      public Frame(MEM.Label label, long depth, long locsSize, long argsSize, long size)
      Constructs a new frame with no temporary variables and no saved registers.
      Parameters:
      label - The function's entry label.
      depth - The function's static depth.
      locsSize - The size of the block of local variables within a frame.
      argsSize - The size of the block of (call, i.e., outgoing) arguments within a frame.
      size - The size of the frame.
